solution_line_template: The discount on the shoes Marcus found is {original_price} * {discount_numerator}/{discount_denominator} = $<<{original_price}*{discount_numerator}/{discount_denominator}={discount_amount}>>{discount_amount}.
That means he only had to pay {original_price} - {discount_amount} = $<<{original_price}-{discount_amount}={price_after_discount}>>{price_after_discount}.
So Marcus was able to save {max_budget} - {price_after_discount} = $<<{max_budget}-{price_after_discount}={money_saved}>>{money_saved}.
